title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Go-based CLI and server for downloading, building and running large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy integration into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration providing Ollama LLM and embeddings wrappers for LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for chatting with any Ollama model, similar to ChatGPT interface.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama, offering typed models and async streaming for JVM projects.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem that exposes the Ollama REST API in idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that connects to a local Ollama server for private LLM conversations.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal-based chat client written in Go with conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for managing and chatting with Ollama models cross-platform.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose examples for running Ollama server with CUDA or CPU only.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and async streaming for C# apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async HTTP client and typed request/response structs for Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with any local Ollama model through slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app for bringing private Ollama models into Slack channels with thread support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated list of GGUF models tested with Ollama including download stats and prompt templates.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB + LangChain to query local documents.
